sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_dict ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, dictmark tinyint not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(name) );

create table sf_dict_item ( id char(32) not null, dictid char(32) not null, parentid char(32), text varchar(128) not null, codeno varchar(128), itemmark tinyint not null, createDate timestamp, userid char(32), description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(dictid, codeno) );
